english.segment1: Darling did you know that I. I dream about you. Waiting for the look in your eyes. When we meet for the first time. Darling did you know that I. I pray about you. Praying that you will hold on. Keep your loving eyes only for me
english.segment2: I am waiting for. Praying for you darling. Wait for me too. Wait for me as I wait for you. I am waiting for. Praying for you darling. Wait for me too. Wait for me as I wait for you. Darling wait
english.segment3: Darling did you know I dream about life together. Knowing it will be forever. I'll be yours and you'll be mine. And darling when I say. Til death do us part. I'll mean it with all of my heart. Now and always faithful to you
english.segment4: I am waiting for. Praying for you darling. Wait for me too. Wait for me as I wait for you. I am waiting for. Praying for you darling. Wait for me too. Wait for me as I wait for you. Darling wait
english.segment5: Now I know you may have made mistakes. But there's forgiveness and a second chance. So wait for me darling. Wait for me. Wait for me.
